name: Use Gothic fonts on got.wikipedia.org
description: This style script will force the use of specific fonts on the Gothic Wikipedia.
additional_info: You will need one of these fonts installed: http://robert-pfeffer.net/schriftarten/englisch/nachgeladener_rahmen.html?ulfilas.html - Install the "Ulfilas II Normal" font for this option. http://robert-pfeffer.net/schriftarten/englisch/nachgeladener_rahmen.html?silubr.html - Install the font file that is in the downloadable ZIP. ------ NOTE: This will break standard English and non-Gothic script text across the whole site. Use at your own risk!
